thread.title: Suicide attack foiled at Dhaka international airport: Bomber killed
thread.title_full: Suicide attack foiled at Dhaka international airport: Bomber killed

title: Suicide attack foiled at Dhaka international airport: Bomber killed
text:
World Suicide attack foiled at Dhaka international airport; bomber killed The attack was carried out on a police check-post at 8 pm but the attacker was killed and no casualties were reported. A + A - 
A suicide bomber attacked the Dhaka international airport in Bangladesh but the security forces foiled the bid and killed the terrorist. 
The attack was carried out on a police check-post at 8 pm but the attacker was killed and no casualties were reported. 
Airport police station officer-in-charge Noor-e-Azam Mia confirmed the attack. Police has already cordoned-off the spot. Higher police officers said they could not guess any motive of the attack so far. 
Reports said the suicide bomber blew himself up near the police checkpost. For more news from India Today, follow us on Twitter @indiatoday and on Facebook at facebook.com/IndiaToday For news and videos in Hindi, go to AajTak.in . ताज़ातरीन ख़बरों और वीडियो के लिए आजतक.इन पर आएं.
